Peter,

My first thought was Nara, Hamano, or Shoami.
    I looked through some books at hand and couldn't
find a better answer. I did come across one tsuba
<<attributed Shonai-Shoami>> that I felt was similar
in some ways. Quickly reading up on Shonai-Shoami: the
NihonTo Koza speaks a littlebit of some mid or later
Edo Nara influence on Shonai-Shoami.
    I would hazard to guess Nara or Shoami (Shonai or
other).
    
Curran
